name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.HigherFacesVanish.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
n : Nat
⊢ AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.HigherFacesVanish (HAdd.hAdd n 1) ((AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X).f (HAdd.hAdd n 1))
decl:
theorem HigherFacesVanish.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap (n : ℕ) :
    HigherFacesVanish (n + 1) ((inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X).f (n + 1)) := fun j _ => by
  dsimp [AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap, NormalizedMooreComplex.objX]
  rw [← factorThru_arrow _ _ (finset_inf_arrow_factors Finset.univ _ j
    (by simp only [Finset.mem_univ])), assoc, kernelSubobject_arrow_comp, comp_zero]

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.factors_normalizedMooreComplex_PInfty
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
n : Nat
⊢ (AlgebraicTopology.NormalizedMooreComplex.objX X n).Factors (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty.f n)
decl:
theorem factors_normalizedMooreComplex_PInfty (n : ℕ) :
    Subobject.Factors (NormalizedMooreComplex.objX X n) (PInfty.f n) := by
  rcases n with _|n
  · apply top_factors
  · rw [PInfty_f, NormalizedMooreComplex.objX, finset_inf_factors]
    intro i _
    apply kernelSubobject_factors
    exact (HigherFacesVanish.of_P (n + 1) n) i le_add_self

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_f
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
n : Nat
⊢ Eq ((AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X).f n) ((AlgebraicTopology.NormalizedMooreComplex.objX X n).factorThru (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty.f n) ⋯)
decl:
/-- `PInfty` factors through the normalized Moore complex -/
@[simps!]
def PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex (X : SimplicialObject A) : K[X] ⟶ N[X] :=
  ChainComplex.ofHom _ _ _ _ _ _
    (fun n => factorThru _ _ (factors_normalizedMooreComplex_PInfty n)) fun n => by
    rw [← cancel_mono (NormalizedMooreComplex.objX X n).arrow, assoc, assoc, factorThru_arrow,
      ← inclusionOfMooreComplexMap_f, ← normalizedMooreComplex_objD,
      ← (inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X).comm (n + 1) n, inclusionOfMooreComplexMap_f,
      factorThru_arrow_assoc, ← alternatingFaceMapComplex_obj_d]
    exact PInfty.comm (n + 1) n

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_comp_inclusionOfMooreComplexMap
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X) (AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X)) AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_comp_inclusionOfMooreComplexMap (X : SimplicialObject A) :
    PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X ≫ inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X = PInfty := by aesop_cat

h : Quiver.Hom ((AlgebraicTopology.alternatingFaceMapComplex A).obj X) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X) h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty h)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_comp_inclusionOfMooreComplexMap (X : SimplicialObject A) :
    PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X ≫ inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X = PInfty := by aesop_cat

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_naturality
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X Y : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.AlternatingFaceMapComplex.map f) (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex Y)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X) (AlgebraicTopology.NormalizedMooreComplex.map f))
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_naturality {X Y : SimplicialObject A} (f : X ⟶ Y) :
    AlternatingFaceMapComplex.map f ≫ PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex Y =
      PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X ≫ NormalizedMooreComplex.map f := by
  aesop_cat

⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.AlternatingFaceMapComplex.map f) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex Y) h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.NormalizedMooreComplex.map f) h))
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex_naturality {X Y : SimplicialObject A} (f : X ⟶ Y) :
    AlternatingFaceMapComplex.map f ≫ PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex Y =
      PInftyToNormalizedMooreComplex X ≫ NormalizedMooreComplex.map f := by
  aesop_cat

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap_comp_PInfty_assoc
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
Z : ChainComplex A Nat
h : Quiver.Hom (AlgebraicTopology.AlternatingFaceMapComplex.obj X) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.PInfty h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X) h)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem inclusionOfMooreComplexMap_comp_PInfty (X : SimplicialObject A) :
    inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X ≫ PInfty = inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X := by
  ext (_|n)
  · dsimp
    simp only [comp_id]
  · exact (HigherFacesVanish.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap n).comp_P_eq_self

name: AlgebraicTopology.DoldKan.instMonoChainComplexNatInclusionOfMooreComplexMap
initialProofState:
A : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} A
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Abelian A
X : CategoryTheory.SimplicialObject A
⊢ CategoryTheory.Mono (AlgebraicTopology.inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X)
decl:
instance : Mono (inclusionOfMooreComplexMap X) :=
  ⟨fun _ _ hf => by
    ext n
    dsimp
    ext
    exact HomologicalComplex.congr_hom hf n⟩
